title: @Riot Running a LoL team at school
body:
I am planning to run a competitive LoL team at my school (Got the green light and everything!) I would like to be able to spectate scrimmage matches of my teams and put it onto a projector, but the 3 min delay seems way too awkward to have, and isn't the most accurate in terms of feedback. Is there any sort of way we can run a sort of LAN network, similar to the LCS (might be wrong on this, sorry if I am) to shorten this spectate delay, or is there a service we could use? 

Broken Blade told me to post it on the boards, sorry if this isn't the right place.

replies.body: That is an idea, will bring it up with the rest. If you come across a member of the eSports team, please get back to me on what they have to say. For now, I think we need to reconsider our streaming setup.
